abstract: Former government officials and classified information experts say president's commander-in-chief role allows Pres-elect Donald J Trump to authorize security clearance for anyone he wants, including family members; response follows reports Trump is seeking security clearance for son-in-law Jared Kushner so he can become official member of inner circle.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: After days of reports that Donald J. Trump had requested a top-secret security clearance for his son-in-law, people close to him said that was not the case, but the law would not stop him.
snippet: After days of reports that Donald J. Trump had requested a top-secret security clearance for his son-in-law, people close to him said that was not the case, but the law would not stop him....

headline.main: Trump Will Have Wide Latitude to Let Family Into Government’s Secret Circles
headline.print_headline: Presidents Have Broad Latitude to Let Relatives Into Government’s Secret Circles
